member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.UITestControlExtensions.FindFirstByXPath(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.UITestControl,System.String)
member.summary: Finds the first UITestControl matching the search criteria specified by the XPath query.
member.param: The control under which to search.
member.returns: The first UITestControl matching the query OR null if no match.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.UITestControlExtensions.FindAllByXPath(Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.UITestControl,System.String)
member.summary: Finds all the UITestControls matching the search criteria specified by the XPath query.
member.param: The control under which to search.
member.returns: An enumeration of all UITestControl matching the query. If there is no match, the enumeration is empty.
